title: Amanda Platell for the Daily Mail
text: PLATELL'S PEOPLE: One of the world's biggest stars, he's worth £160 million aged 28, and last year alone earned £88 million. He married his childhood sweetheart in secret last year, and they live in a £1 million Suffolk home near where they both grew up. With his mop of ginger hair, geeky glasses and hoodie, Ed looks as though he's just fallen out of the local Oxfam shop. What a contrast to oh-so flashy Hamilton with his vast, show-off diamond earrings. Yes he's the first and only black British F1 champion. Yes he's a formidable driver and his brilliance has deservedly earned him a £187 million fortune at 32. But far from embracing his home town, he described Stevenage as 'the slums'. He also sacked his dad from his management team - the same dad who sacrificed so much to keep his son's motor racing dream alive. ...read
description: Amanda Platell for the Daily Mail Columnist Archive for MailOnline
